div.head: 釣痛
div.div: pain as if being pulled with a hook

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: pain as if being pulled with a hook

sense.def: Illness Sign of a violent pain associated with a sensation as if something were being intensely pulled on the affected location. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 12: 五苓散，治陰核氣結，腫大 釣痛 , “Powder with wu ling cures qi nodes in the testicles, with an enlargement resulting from a swelling and a pain as if one were pulled with a hook”.
